TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A drug that belongs to the family of drugs called angiogenesis inhibitors. It prevents the growth of new blood vessels into a solid tumor.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "lactato de escualamina"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento que es un tipo de inhibidor de la angiogénesis. Previene el crecimiento de nuevos vasos sanguíneos en un tumor sólido.
